articles.title: WhatsApp: How to start a voice or video call from a Mac or Windows 10 PC - Express
articles.description: WHATSAPP is the world's most popular chat platform, boasting 1.6 billion users. WhatsApp can also be used to make video calls over the internet (VoIP calls). But can you make voice and video calls from a Mac or Windows 10 PC via WhatsApp Web?

articles.title: Alexa, upgrade my tablet! Amazon updates entire range of Fire HD 8 slates - Express.co.uk
articles.description: AMAZON has unveiled three new versions of its popular Fire HD 8 tablets with faster performance, more storage to carry your eBooks, movies, and magazines and wireless charging support for the first time. Here's everything you need to know.
